data.text: Harigi tuga mben Zisas Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena vhen vergi. Mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve rɨgar hareŋ kongi guma mbe vhɨra mbe phorga mba phena vhen ki.
Gumgi mbari Zisas bigɨn thueŋ muuŋgirim, mbe ne suaŋv ana suan zav tuavi ndi garav, rɨmgi sigap, ara thivgiav ki. Mbe khueŋ nzuav ana gari, ana Sabatar kha guman kurarie?
Mbe ne nzuav garav kim, Zisas mbaram khaŋ mba hareŋ kongi guma ga nzuai, “Khavgi zɨ, za kheiŋ nɨma thɨgɨ.”

Ana thɨgim, Zisas mbaram mben nzarigi, “Maaŋgi tɨv Sabat tɨva phɨri, tɨvar vhuuaŋ mbui ne, ee, tɨvar mbatɨga mbui ne, ee guman kurkurigi ne, ee guman farfagi ne?” Ana mba nzambaren mbe nɨɨŋgi, mbe za nimra ki.

Ana phokphoga mbe garav, mbe nzuav ndap shigi. Ana mbe garim, mbe kora mbui ndɨkndɨk ki fhu. Ana guigira mbe nzuav ndap simgiap, khaŋ mba guma ga nzuai, “Ndu hareŋ ndegɨ.” Mba guma wo hareŋ ndegim, ana har taagia nzerigi.
3.6: Mt 22.15-16Mba Fherasiŋ gumgi maaŋ kav, mba bigeŋ gangiap, mba phena thav kɨrar hegap, vov Herot gumgi phorga Zisas shogɨrga kama shogi.

Zisas wo phorga rui gumgir kov, mbe Gariri mbɨn veri. Ana verim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve Garirin fhain kegap, ana zɨn veri. Gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve vhɨra Zudia fhain kegap verim, Zerusareman ŋgu gum, Edumia fhain gum, Zordan mbɨ khiŋgiap muen Taia gu Saidon fhain kegap, ana han veri. Mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ana mbui bigi kameŋ mbararagiap, ana han veri.

3.9-10: Mt 9.21; 14.36; Mk 4.1; 5.29; 6.56; Ru 5.1-3; 7.21Mbe vergim, Zisas gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrver kurav, mbe muuŋgim, mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzgi. Mba rɨmrɨɨ ki gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve wari wo rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨ zav, wari ga bɨrbɨrav Zisas suigɨr zav ana han zi. Mbe zegav, sia Zisas ga suagi. Zisas mbaram khaŋ wo phorga rui gumgi ga nzuai, “Nde kema the ndigi zɨv khaŋ phorgɨri. Kha gumgi gu mbigi maaŋ muuŋgip na ndirarga fhu.”

3.11: Mk 1.23-24; Ru 4.41Zisas maaŋ mbuim, mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi vhen ndagi gumgi zav Zisas gari. Mbe Zisas garavra thav, mba ŋiniŋgi za mbe mbuim, mbe wari fov Zisas nɨma suav nzɨɨv, za khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma!”
3.12: Mt 8.4; 12.16; Mk 1.34Mbe maaŋ mbuim, ana kama havharan mbe thɨvav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde khaŋ suaŋ thari, ‘Ndu Fhe Bakɨmen Kam ma!’ ”
Zisas Gariri mbɨ gaar kegap, khavgiap mbɨkshɨɨ piin ndav, wo vuzvugi gumgi ga nzuaim, mbe ana han ndai.
Mbe ndagim, ana 12 thɨgi gumgi farasegi. Mbe ana phorgɨv kɨri, ana zumgum mbe sararim, mbe ŋgɨv, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ bun suanga.
Ana vhɨra wo ŋkasŋkan mben nɨɨŋgiri, mbe vhɨra ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvhararga.
3.16: Zo 1.42Ana mba farasegi gumgi khare, Saimon, ana kha zɨ phorga ana tɨgi, Pita.
3.17: Ru 9.54Zebedin kamani Zems gu Zon, ana kha zɨ phorga mani ga tɨgi, Buanazis. Kha zɨ nɨɨŋge khaŋ nzuai, ndav shiav san kama ndi gumgi.
Andru gum, Firip, Bartoromiu, Matiu, Tomas, Arfias kama Zems, Tadius, Saimon, mbe Zerotan rɨgi gumgi.
Askariat guma Zudas, Zisas thuuŋ dorgav ana bun ana pana gumgi ga suaŋgi guma.

Zisas taagia Kaperneaman vergap phena vhen ki. Ana phena vhen kim, gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve taagia zav ana phok thɨgi. Mba gumgi gu mbigi guigira vhɨrkɨvgi. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgiap, ana wo phorga rui gumgir kov, mbe mban mbɨrga tuktɨgi fhu.
3.21: Zo 7.5; 10.20Zisas fegi gu ŋgugi kha kameŋ mbararagiap, ana kov ŋgɨr zav zi. Mbe khaŋ nzuai, “Ana ŋanŋangi.”

Mba Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi mbari Zerusareman kegap zergav khaŋ nzuai, “Ana Bersebur ana vhen ndagi. Ana ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi gari guman panan ŋkasŋkar kha ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi ga vharvharigi.” 3.22 Satan zɨ mbe khare, Bersebur.
Zisas mbe nzuai kameŋ mbararagiap, mbaram mben kamgia buna muen mben nzarigi. Ana mben nzav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Satan ram muuŋgip taagip wora vharvhararie?
Ŋgu bakɨ the rɨgɨra wo sharav wari shogɨrga, mba ŋgu kegɨrga fhu.
Mba tɨv vhɨra, phena bavira ki ntɨɨri, mbe rɨgɨra wari sharav, wari shogɨrga, mba phenan ki ntɨɨri kegɨrga fhu.
Satan vhɨra, ana nduaram wo sharav wo phorgɨv shogɨrga, anan ŋkasŋka kegɨrga fhu. Anan ŋkasŋka za vhɨzgirga.
“Nde mbarara! Guma the fhura guma ŋkasŋka the phenan ŋgirgɨp, ana bigi kɨmgirga tuktɨgi fhu. Ana maaŋ muun saŋv, ana fharav mba guma kegɨp, ana ndi tɨgɨp, ana za ana bigi kɨmɨnga.
“Gu guigira nde nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi gum mbe Fhe Bakɨme zɨn farfagi tɨvi, ana nta vhɨzɨrga tuap ki.

Guma the Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaarar farfagirga, Fhe Bakɨme mba guma ana Ŋina Ŋaara zɨn farfagi bigeŋ, ana ne vhɨzgirga tuap ki fhu. Mba bigɨna mbatɨgeŋ mbara muuŋgip kɨrim, ana rimgirga ne mbara muuŋgip kɨrga.”

Mbe khuen ana nzuai, “Ŋina mbatɨk ana vhen ki.” Ana ne nzuav kha kamen mbe suaŋgi. 3.30 Zisas Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaarar ŋkasŋkan panan wo ŋaara mbui. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ma. Maaŋ muuŋgip, gumgi thari khaŋ suanga, Zisas Satan gum harigi ŋina mbatɨga ŋkasŋkan panan ŋgari. Mba khesharigi bunin Zisas ga nzuai gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ndim mbɨ vhuav ana nzɨɨi.
Zisas mba bunin mbe nzuav kim, ana niamuuŋ gum anan ŋgugi, mbe zav, mba Zisas ki phena thɨma thivgiap, guma mbe sarigim, ana Zisas ga suan zav vhen veri.
Gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ana rorgia piigiap kav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ena, ndu niamuuŋ gum ŋgugi, mbe ndu nzuav zegap kɨrar ki.”
Mbe nen ana nzuaim, ana mben nzarigi, “Theiŋ na niamuuŋ gum ŋgugi?”
Ana mba nzambaren mbe mbuav, mba ana rorgia piigi gumgi gu mbigi garav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Khe na niamuuŋ gum na ŋgugi khare.
Guma o mbik Fhe Bakɨme vuzvuga zɨn vui, mba guma gum mbik, ana nan ŋguk, gum nan bip, gum niamuuŋ ma.”
